Contact Us

Plantation Oaks is nestled among magnificent oak and flowering magnolia trees. The lush landscaping provides the perfect setting for outdoor activities or a serene view from your screened in porch. Situated west of the Ashley River, Plantation Oaks is located in close proximity to downtown Charleston, the Ashley River or local beaches. Plantation Oaks offers the apartment home features and community conveniences that will enhance your quality of life.
